sentences.en: A great derisive exhibition was held in Munich.
sentences.cn: 在慕尼黑举行一次嘲弄性的大型展览.

sentences.en: And then we went to Munich.
As an intellectual Goebbels looked down on the crude philistines of the leading group in Munich.
sentences.cn: 戈培尔是个知识分子,看不起慕尼黑领导层不学无术的市侩庸人.

sentences.en: BA Flight 144 from Munich is overdue owing to engine trouble.
sentences.cn: 自慕尼黑起飞的英航144班机因引擎故障而误点了.

sentences.en: Bad flight 144 from Munich was overdue owing to engine trouble.
sentences.cn: 自慕尼黑起飞的英航144班机因引擎故而误点了.

sentences.en: Bayern Munich have joined the race for Fiorentina striker Luca Toni.
sentences.cn: 拜仁慕尼黑已经加入到对佛罗伦萨前锋卢卡.托尼的兴趣行列中.

sentences.en: Delirious crowds cheered Neville Chamberlain's return from Munich.
sentences.cn: 疯狂的民众欢呼内维尔·张伯伦从慕尼黑归来.

sentences.en: I'd like to book a seat to Munich for Monday the tenth.
sentences.cn: 我想订10号星期一飞往慕尼黑的机票一张.

sentences.en: More than 10 percent of Munich residents live below the poverty line.
sentences.cn: 超过10％的慕尼黑居民生活在贫困线以下。

sentences.en: Munich locals are not so conspicuous and perhaps to all the liquor.
sentences.cn: 慕尼黑本地人倒不那么显眼了,也许都去卖酒了.

sentences.en: Munich, where the beer is the most important agricultural products.
sentences.cn: 慕尼黑的啤酒是那里最重要的农产品.

sentences.en: She urgently phones her contact, and he orders her to go to Munich and remain untraceable.
sentences.cn: 她急切地打电话给她的联络人，对方指令她前往慕尼黑，并保持不被他人找到。

sentences.en: That pilot is now, incidentally, a well - known newspaper publisher in Munich.
sentences.cn: 那个飞行员现在已经成了慕尼黑一位颇有声望的报刊发行人.

sentences.en: The President is using the two visits to lay the ghosts of the Munich Agreement.
sentences.cn: 总统正借这两次访问来消除《慕尼黑协定》的阴影。

sentences.en: The president stopped off in Poland on his way to Munich for the economic summit.
sentences.cn: 总统在赴慕尼黑参加经济峰会的途中在波兰作了短暂停留。

sentences.en: The question is whether to go to Munich or Vienna.
sentences.cn: 问题是去慕尼黑还是去维也纳.

sentences.en: This train would stop twice more in the suburbs before rolling southeast toward Munich.
sentences.cn: 火车向东南驶往慕尼黑前，会在郊区再停两站。
